example.text: The project of Shandong Daewoo Automobile Parts and Components Co. , Ltd. , that Korea 's Daewoo Corp. is participating in [*] investing in [*T*-34] , has a total investment exceeding 2 billion yuan RMB and an annual production of automobile parts and components that [*T*-35] could accessorize 200,000 to 300,000 cars .
